channel.title: Juggalos
channel.description: i made a FB status sayin Juggalos were gay and now im gonna get my ass kicked by all the juvenile kids and theyre like 13-15 yrs old in 8th grade and like 6ft tall and im like 5ft scrawny ass. What do I do? do I try to kick their ass, or just pussy out? :confused:

item.title: Juggalos
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:31, topic:374970”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=470937.msg3444550#msg3444550 date=1293325217]

Let me see if I put Juggalo on my fb status. Lets see what happens ^_^.

Advice, bring a knife of some sort, or you can run.

…but make sure that the knife is big (meat cleaver, samurai sword), so hopefully you will just scare them off without having to face a murder/GBH charge

If we are gonna do knives, learn some tricks with a balisong (butterfly knife) and scare em. Ive so far, made 3 people piss themselves because of this type of shit. Makes you look like you know what your doing.


[/quote]

I have a butterfly knife stolen from a dead insurgent in afghanistan. It’s pretty rad.[/quote]
And i’ve got a the shell of a 25mm machine gun from an AC130 that flew during Vietnam.

Read full topic
